alert.note: Alert for Buffalo (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued April 09 at 8:53PM CDT until further notice by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Wisconsin... Mississippi River at Wabasha affecting Buffalo and Wabasha Counties. ...FLOOD WATCH FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Wabasha. * WHEN...From Friday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Wisconsin Highway 35 between Maiden Rock and Stockholm may experience flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 9.9 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached Friday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued Monday morning.
